item.description:
Join your fellow Pub Crawlers on our 3rd Annual Pub Crawl on Boylston Street in Boston!

**UPDATE**

Here is the schedule for our crawl:

2:00 p.m. - Dillon's
3:00 p.m. - Cactus Club
4:00 p.m. - McGreevy's
5:00 p.m. - Pour House
6:00 p.m. - Lir
7:00 p.m. - Towne Stove and Spirits
8:00 p.m. - Whiskey Smokehouse

Be sure to let your friends know about this too! The more, the merrier!

This event has been opened to the Red Sox Natives, Fun with Alcohol, Social Fun, and the Boston Happy Hour Meetup groups.

**SPECIALS ANNOUNCED**

Cactus Club - 50% of appetizers
McGreevy's - $9 pitcher of PBR, $3 drafts of PBR, $4 drafts for Bud/Bud Light
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and you should too...
item.name: 3rd Annual Bolyston Street Pub Crawl
